content: additional stitch from your cast on stitches if you can see in the pattern every other row the total number of continue seed stitch pattern decreasing every other row stitches worked increases by 1 the odd numbered row until 1 stitch remains bind off work the *k1 p1* seed stitch pattern incorporating a new stitch every other row until all the cast on stitches are i hope you enjoyed this worked pattern please feel free to share your photos with me original pattern by nicole xia on ravelry or instagram ravelry kneeecoalknits // instagram kneecoalknits please do not claim this pattern as your own or sell this pattern if you would like to sell the products created by this pattern please credit the design to me this products from this pattern cannot be sold for mass production or factory manufacturing thank you for you respect and understanding
